Project Summary

Project Information

FieldValue
Namepepper-doc
DescriptionPepper is a plugable converter framework to convert linguistic data between several formats. Pepper is based on the linguistic meta model Salt. New formats can easily plugged into the framework via creating a PepperModule.
Homepagehttps://korpling.german.hu-berlin.de/p/projects/pepper/pepper-doc
